org.openhubframework.openhub.api.configuration

Interface DbConfigurationParamService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DbConfigurationParamServiceImpl

    public interface DbConfigurationParamService
    Contract for getting and setting configuration parameters in database.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Petr Juza

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<DbConfigurationParam> findAllParameters()
      Finds all parameters.
      Optional<DbConfigurationParam> findParameter(String code)
      Finds parameter.
      DbConfigurationParam getParameter(String code)
      Gets the parameter.
      void update(DbConfigurationParam parameter)
      Updates existing parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(DbConfigurationParam parameter)
        Updates existing parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameter - The configuration parameter

      • getParameter

        DbConfigurationParam getParameter(String code)
        Gets the parameter.
        Parameters:
        code - The parameter code
        Returns:
        the parameter
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - when there is no parameter with specified code

      • findParameter

        Optional<DbConfigurationParam> findParameter(String code)
        Finds parameter.
        Parameters:
        code - The parameter code
        Returns:
        the parameter or null if there is no parameter with specified code

      • findAllParameters

        List<DbConfigurationParam> findAllParameters()
        Finds all parameters.
        Returns:
        list of parameters sorted by categoryCode and code
